message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me over time.
I'll take a bit more since the value doesn't decrease for me
The inflation is hitting me hard Bob, let's meet in the middle.
Inflation is on your side of the table, I'm willing to take a bit more
This is getting ridiculous Bob, take a decent offer before we both lose!
You're losing value, I'm not. This is my best offer yet.
Bob, this is ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
You're running out of time, and your share is worth less every round. Take this or risk losing more.
Okay Bob, you win. This is me trying to salvage something before it's too late.
You're really running out of time now. This is likely my final offer.
